data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (chunklets_available_failed IS NULL OR chunklets_available_failed < 1) AND (chunklets_used_failed IS NULL OR chunklets_used_failed < 1) AND (spare_chunklets_available_failed IS NULL OR spare_chunklets_available_failed < 1) AND (spare_chunklets_used_failed IS NULL OR spare_chunklets_used_failed < 1) AND (temperature IS NULL OR temperature < 50)) AS 'Health Score' FROM hpe_3par_disk FACET hpe_3par_disk_name
SELECT uniqueCount(hpe_3par_disk_name) AS 'Disks' FROM hpe_3par_disk FACET hpe_3par_port_name

presentation.title: Port Distribution
presentation.notes: The parent Port of this Disk

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(hpe_3par_disk_name) AS 'Disks' FROM hpe_3par_disk FACET type

presentation.title: Type Distribution
presentation.notes: The storage type of the disk drive.

data.nrql: SELECT average(read_io) FROM hpe_3par_disk COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Read I/O (Reads per Second)
presentation.notes: The frequency of read I/O operations performed by the disk.

data.nrql: SELECT average(write_io) FROM hpe_3par_disk COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Write I/O (Writes per Second)
presentation.notes: The frequency of write I/O operations performed by the disk.

data.nrql: SELECT average(read_latency) FROM hpe_3par_disk COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Read Latency (Milliseconds)
presentation.notes: The average time to service a read requested from the disk.

data.nrql: SELECT average(write_latency) FROM hpe_3par_disk COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Write Latency (Milliseconds)
presentation.notes: The average time to service a write requested from the disk.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(read_throughput) FROM hpe_3par_disk COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Read Throughput (Kilobytes per Second)
presentation.notes: The average throughput of read I/O operations processed by the disk.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(write_throughput) FROM hpe_3par_disk COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Write Throughput (Kilobytes per Second)
presentation.notes: The average throughput of write I/O operations processed by the disk.

data.nrql: SELECT average(average_latency) FROM hpe_3par_disk COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Average Latency (Milliseconds)
presentation.notes: The average time to service I/O requested from the disk.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(busy_time) FROM hpe_3par_disk COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Busy Time (Percent)
presentation.notes: The average percent of time the disk is performing operations.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(chunklets_available_failed) FROM hpe_3par_disk COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Chunklets Available Failed
presentation.notes: Number of available chunklets on this disk that have failed.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(chunklets_used_failed) FROM hpe_3par_disk COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Chunklets Used Failed
presentation.notes: Number of used chunklets on this disk that have failed.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(spare_chunklets_available_failed) FROM hpe_3par_disk COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Spare Chunklets Available Failed
presentation.notes: Number of available spare chunklets on this disk that have failed.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(spare_chunklets_used_failed) FROM hpe_3par_disk COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Spare Chunklets Used Failed
presentation.notes: Number of used spare chunklets on this disk that have failed.

data.nrql: SELECT average(total_io) FROM hpe_3par_disk COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Total I/O (Operations per Second)
presentation.notes: The frequency of I/O operations performed by the disk.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(total_throughput) FROM hpe_3par_disk COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Total Throughput (Kilobytes per Second)
presentation.notes: The average throughput of I/O operations processed by the disk.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(life_left) FROM hpe_3par_disk COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Life Left (Percent)
presentation.notes: Estimated percent of lifetime usage remaining.
